lender.name: Jan Haakon Killerud
lender.occupational_info: Working to improve the public waste handeling in the city of Oslo, Norway. Our goal is to recycle as much of the waste from households as possible and turning it into new resources.

lender.name: Tony C. Adiang
lender.loan_because: I like to help other people achieve their dreams.

lender.name: KCD

lender.occupational_info: Using the Internet, I help to create pathways for people to work and play in a clean energy environment.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: I believe in capitalism. I am blessed in my life and want so much to do my tiny part to help people pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother, wife and student. I also sell real estate.

lender.name: Monica & Peter
lender.loan_because: We believe in the idea of help in selfhelp and in microloans, specially to women.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with a good family and a good paying job - I'd like to give back to society and pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: I design websites and make them easier to use

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Kiva is such a fantastic chance to help someone that I may have never had the opportunity to meet otherwise.
lender.occupational_info: I keep 6 radio stations on the air. I maintain the transmitters and studios.

lender.name: Dirk
lender.loan_because: I believe in the micro credit idea and I like being able to help individuals directly without going through some untransparent third party.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: a chance of work is the seed of dignity

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: This is another way to help others. I try to give in the area I live in and travel around the world on mission trips. I try to be just a another helping hand in this world.
lender.occupational_info: When your house is on fire I am one of the people that puts it out.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I want to help!
lender.occupational_info: I am studying in school to become a doctor, and I would love to travel to developing countries when I finish my education.

lender.name: Chris

lender.occupational_info: Small Business Owner

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I help convert movies to DVD format so more people can enjoy films if they do not have access to a traditional movie theater.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It is so much fun and I have way more than I need. I can learn from the way that others do business in the world and stay inspired by other entrepreneurs. I love diversity.
lender.occupational_info: I help the world do business, be creative and realize we are all connected.

lender.name: Nate & Amber
lender.loan_because: We wanted our Wedding money to go through a cause we believe in and hope that through it we can share our happiness.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: A small way of helping others help themselves & hopefully show that people care for each other no matter where we are on this planet.

lender.name: Calgary Kindness
lender.loan_because: This group of women is comprised of friends and colleagues...but more like sisters... We are giving back what we have been given...
lender.occupational_info: We work in a global organization in Calgary, Alberta, Canada.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: it's time to get serious

lender.name: Kirk
lender.loan_because: I want to help make it posible for people in third world countries make a life for themselves, just as I am trying to do here in the States.

lender.occupation: nurse by day, online business by night
lender.loan_because: now I can, but remember well a different time.

lender.occupation: Teacher, founder of Three By Sea

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: It empowers people and causes responsibility

lender.name: Dalton
lender.loan_because: A Kiva account was a gift to me and my brother for Christmas one year and it is wonderful to support industrious and hopeful people in other parts of the world- so easy to keep giving!
lender.occupational_info: Mother, student, realtor (help people buy and sell real estate)

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures of broken computer parts, parts you cant see with the naked eye.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: there is a need and while small in lending I hope to help others do well
lender.occupational_info: Work with children who have been abandoned, neglected or abused by their caregivers

lender.name: Pamela Jo
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important that we help others who are trying to help themselves. We are called to do this whether by our God, our inate ethics, or by the spirit that guides us.
lender.occupational_info: I own a home-based travel agency. I am also in the process of starting a non-profit for medical supplies to patients in South Georgia - North Florida region.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: God commanded that we love our neighbors as ourselves, no matter where they live.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: Others believed in me many years ago, and helped me to get started in business. I believe in the honesty and hard work of people and am thankful that my loans can help others to improve their lives and the lives of their families. I believe in entrepreneurship, which enables people to do things for themselves-- but it also helps to create new jobs and strengthen local economies. I love the Kiva concept and the insightful way they bring people together. The idea of people borrowing from other people in order to accomplish something better and more powerful is what the information age is truly all about!
lender.occupational_info: I own an information technology consulting firm that I started many years ago. We help governments and businesses to make their computer networks to run more efficiently and more securely. I work from my home in the mountains of north Georgia, plus I travel, mostly to Washington, DC and the Middle East. I am a husband, father of 4 grown children, and grandfather. I am active in my local church and volunteer with the local Boy Scouts of America and the Georgia Wing of the Civil Air Patrol.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: we have so much in this country, and this is a small way to invest in people around the world.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe in ending poverty and creating avenues of independence and prosperity for all of humanity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a public school teacher. I teach students with special needs; who have trouble learning and need extra help. I teach children who need a little extra time to understand their lessons.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I'd like to know that there is something I can do as an individual for another individual to benefit all humanity.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves to improve thier lives.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer chips

lender.name: Alysha & Chris
lender.loan_because: We feel lucky to have so many resources available to us in Australia and want to share with others who will greatly benefit
lender.occupational_info: Chris is a musician and songwriter, Alysha works for an Internet company.

lender.name: Terilyn
lender.loan_because: To help make a difference in the lives of others

lender.name: Rafael
lender.loan_because: I feel morally obligated to help my brothers and sisters of the world!

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Pay It Forward

lender.name: Marla
lender.loan_because: I want to help end poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers on Energy Efficiency programs.

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: I'm a small business owner and want to help others achieve the same. Starting a business is hard and if I hadn't had help from those who believed I could succeed I'd have never got off the ground.
lender.occupational_info: I make and sell jewelry and small sculpture over the internet and also at art and craft fairs in my area.

lender.name: Elena
lender.loan_because: This is a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 7th grade math.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: There are enough takers in the world, giving a little bit here and there adds up in the long run!

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: After seeing the special on TV, my heart really goes out to these people who wish to have an opportunity to succeed. Really impressed with Kiva's mission and will proudly display banner on my website and do what I can to help.
lender.occupational_info: Originate mortgage loans and work with the SBA-Disaster Assistance Reserve assisting victims of hurricanes obtain low interest loans.

lender.name: 7 Turns
lender.loan_because: Helping me help others help themselves. Thanks Kiva !

lender.name: PackagingARTS team
lender.occupation: Printing and Packaging small business group
lender.loan_because: We believe in the spirit of people and love to see someone achieve their dreams through hard work and determination. We believe in people.
lender.occupational_info: We are a small creative services business that designs and prints packaging and promotional items in northern California, USA near San Francisco.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: For two reasons. First I am lucky enough that I can and I know that I can not change the world but just maybe I can change one persons life.
lender.occupational_info: I setup and help manage IT networks. In short I repair computers. :)

lender.name: Greg and Deborah
lender.loan_because: Small business fuels innovation, creativity, hope and economic growth.
lender.occupational_info: Artist / Internet business

lender.name: Antino
lender.occupation: Surviving Against All Odds With Home Business
lender.loan_because: Trying to help someone with what little I have to share because someone has alot less than I do and I can not complain just help in any little way I can. This is what I like to do and I always will. Therefore I am BLESSED!
lender.occupational_info: Trying to get help in starting a foundation to help others in causes that are the closest to my heart. Just doing what I can. Because, I could be the person I am trying to help. I do this because I want to and giving and helping is the best teacher. When people purchase something from my website www.tni.com/2219033. I use a portion of the profits to help others on Kiva and other charitable organizations that draw me to their cause.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We're all related and helping one another helps ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: Sustainable Human Nature Partnership

lender.name: Liv
lender.loan_because: it's one of the easiest, most effective ways to make a difference in someone's life... halfway across the world.
lender.occupational_info: With a degree in screenwriting and as a band manager, I feel passionately about the world being an artful place, and am working towards knowing the administrative side of the arts. I work as an assistant to a film producer and am a marketing intern at a digital arts school here in Chicago. I also serve/bartend in order to pay the bills. :)

lender.name: AndyAnnieAva
lender.loan_because: everyone's hope deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Sit in front of a computer all day

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: I truly believe that the essence of change begins with the individual. For me, food is life. It can bring joy, summon emotions, and heal pain. I work in the restaurant industry because I express myself with food. Since I am lucky enough to enjoy bountiful food, since my life is filled with wonderful flavors, the least I can do is bring that to others. Though I will loan to anyone, I am particularly focused on restaurants and food sales, as this is my passion as well. It is my hope that these loans will bring food to more and more people. Each restaurant or store we fund brings tastes, smells, and nourishment to their areas. I also hope to focus on advancement for women with my lending. Live well and enjoy!

lender.name: donnie
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: military

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: inevitably, we are all connected. A small contribution can make a world of difference in another's life.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Victor
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: Uncle Brian got me involved with this site via the gift of giving!

lender.name: Travnik family
lender.loan_because: We believe there is enough for everyone.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I believe in history's fugitive moments of compassion rather than it's countless centuries of war and oppression
lender.occupational_info: I am a nursing student. I am in school to learn the art and scientific method of healing people.

lender.name: Kalinaw Mindanao
lender.whereabouts: cagayan de oro city Misamis Oriental
lender.loan_because: we want to help others ans spread the good news about peace.
lender.occupational_info: Kalinaw Mindanao Movement, Inc. (KMMI) is a CHILDREN, YOUTH AND CITIZEN FOR PEACE ACTION,– a Human Rights, Environment and Peace building advocacy concentrated mainly on Interfaith (religious studies and dialogue) and Culture of Peace, a missionary of the love of GOD and an ambassador of peace, non profit, non stock, non sectarian and non-government organization (NGO). This organization is primarily operated by the students, youth, young professionals and assisted by individual donors. KMMI CYC FOR PEACE ACTION is a workshop-seminars base organization. The fundamental concepts of the organization are taken from the Christian, Islam, Buddhist and Indigenous belief (referred to Lumads ) principles. Since the Organization is strictly non-sectarian, we do not engage with conversion of faith and religion. Also, K-Mindanao response the call of the Philippine Government under the Presidential Proclamation 127, S.2001 which sets the last Thursday of November to the first Wednesday of December as the Mindanao Week of Peace. To actively response to the call in celebration with Mindanao Week of Peace we must first enlighten and impart the peace and development education to the future leaders –Children and Youth.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: a lack of capital shouldn't be the reason these entrepreneurs can't realize their dreams. They have enough other challenges to face.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: there is too much that restricts governments and private organizations. If I as an individual can support an individual's drive and innovation somewhere else in the world, then we are truly forging a global community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student in the United States.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Very nice, like you and your people.

lender.name: Nurit
lender.loan_because: We are Israeli. We are four right now. Nurit, Amots, Ruti, Yaacov. Nurit is giving the loans through Kiva, the others give money but have no time or computer skills, so I -Nurit, am giving in their names. I am 42, married, 2 children, I am handicapped, ussing a wheelchair, so I get my living as a pension from the government (Israel). I was born in a kibbutz and believe that people should get a chance. since I am lucky and have everything I need, I am grateful to KIVA and to all the entrepreneurs for giving me a chance to give and to be on the helping side (being handicapped, i know what it means to get help when you need it)

lender.name: Bryan & Isabelle
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference, however small.

lender.name: lamorna
lender.loan_because: I lend so I can give back and help others to make the most of their lives :)
lender.occupational_info: In economics we juggle a lot of numbers. The important thing to remember is the lives which they represent, every one of which is special and important.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: it makes perfect sense
lender.occupational_info: nursing is what it is every where in the world!

lender.name: Santiago
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea.

lender.name: Mamilldo
lender.loan_because: I want to give small companies around the world a chance to succeed with their business.
lender.occupational_info: I working with the web since 1999, married with two kids. I started lending to Kiva entreprenours in 2008, and hope continue doing so.

lender.name: Dag
lender.loan_because: Feels good too do somthing nice for somebody.
lender.occupational_info: Economics and accounting.

lender.name: Nuria
lender.loan_because: a good way to help

lender.name: angela
lender.loan_because: I love to help people and microfinance is a great and effective concept
lender.occupational_info: I create strategies for cooperations and mergers & acquisitions

lender.name: Mykael
lender.loan_because: My vision and mision is to provide recording service in the cheapest way so every talent can be recorded in our country. Most of the time, only some fancy rich boy with no talent at all can make a records while those who is not just sitting wasting their great talent without having any opportunity to let people hear or see in wide point of view. and for the quality of our product it become more critical for us to get more money to boost up from the standard recording equipment to a better one. While world of recording become more advanced then to make recording with a great result is more cheaper and fast and convinient way become possible because it's in digital way.
lender.occupational_info: Me and My friend running a very small home recording studio but we do pay attention to the quality of our product so it will not end up in thrash can. Both of us start with ZERO money and only have a good will and hard work to get to this point where we can have a small home studio for recording. so basically we do the recording, arrangement, mixing and master, all in one package.

lender.name: Gert-Jan
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good way to help people getting out of poverty by making it possible for them to start their own businesses by using a small amount of money.

lender.name: Ginger
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office environment. I am responsible for maintaining compliance with state and federal laws for a mortgage lending company.

lender.name: Jason and Jen
lender.loan_because: Reading "Out of Poverty" opened our eyes to the fact that truly helping people involves helping them create their own economies and therefore income. Kiva is the most powerful realization of that idea we've seen yet.

lender.name: Per Frisk
lender.loan_because: a good way to serve

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I loan because at one point, after a divorce, I needed to start over and was lucky enough to have a job and friends to help. I focus on loaning to women who are starting over, no matter what the cause.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I realise how lucky I am.
lender.occupational_info: I study economics.

lender.name: Emmanuel Udo
lender.loan_because: to set up my wife business
lender.occupational_info:
Cook foodstuffs according to menus, special dietary or nutritional restrictions, and numbers of portions to be served.
Clean and inspect galley equipment, kitchen appliances, and work areas in order to ensure cleanliness and functional operation.
Direct activities of one or more workers who assist in preparing and serving meals.
Bake breads, rolls, and other pastries.
Clean, cut, and cook meat, fish, and poultry.
Compile and maintain records of food use and expenditures.
Determine meal prices based on calculations of ingredient prices.
Requisition food supplies, kitchen equipment, and appliances, based on estimates of future needs.
Apportion and serve food to facility residents, employees, or patrons.
Monitor menus and spending in order to ensure that meals are prepared economically.
Monitor use of government food commodities to ensure that proper procedures are followed.
Plan menus that are varied, nutritionally balanced, and appetizing, taking advantage of foods in season and local availability.
Take inventory of supplies and equipment.
Train new employees.
Wash pots, pans, dishes, utensils, and other cooking equipment

I love to support causes. Right now i am located in North America and support Breast Cancer Research and the local SPCA. I am either always helping raise money for these causes or Donating myself.
As a cancer patient myself, i know the importance of Research. Together we can fgiht Cancer and find a cure.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Internet Consultant at this time. Due to the fact that i can not leave my home due to therapy and of course my self esteem, I help other's succeed in thier Business Adventures. Through Webdesign, Advertising and Marketing Cybersolutionz can help!

lender.occupation: Vice President for an Education Technology Company
lender.occupational_info: I help provide internet access to schools and libraries.

lender.loan_because: I want to make a change in this world.
lender.occupational_info: Managing a small, really small part of the operation of a Airline.

lender.name: indiaforever21
lender.loan_because: i already have what i need.

lender.name: Nancy Bennett
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to support themselves, if this money helps someone accomplish that goal, it's a wonderful thing.

lender.name: Vici
lender.loan_because: I like to help where I can, and it would be such a different world we live in if everybody choose to support another person.
lender.occupational_info: I organise, meetings, exhibitions and festivals

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We can make this world a better place. Because I have the ability to choose what I want to do. I would like others to have the same opportunities that I do. I want others to have the freedom to elect if they want to go to school, not if they can afford it. For all of this we need to improve individuals lives and infrastructure, we can do that if we raise the standard of living for these individual people.
lender.occupational_info: I try to understand everything.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I'm thankful for the opportunity to make a big difference with little resources.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: We are all strangers until we meet and become friends so I am loaning to the friends I have never met!
lender.occupational_info: I teach people from other countries how to do business in Canada

lender.name: Lynn

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: its an easy way for me to make a big difference even with my limited resources. And I love that its not a hand-out. Its a way to empower people in a big way.
lender.occupational_info: I do community development work in Denver, Colorado. My program is particularly focused on Latino youth.

lender.name: Pedro

lender.loan_because: We all need help at some point in our life. I have been blessed to have help in mine and I want to give back to those seeking to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an integrated branding agency that produces interactive, social media, print, video, and strategy based campaigns for all types of businesses.

lender.loan_because:
of Matthew 25:37-40:
Then the righteous will answer him, ‘Lord, when did we see you hungry and feed you, or thirsty and give you something to drink? When did we see you sick or in prison and go to visit you?’ The King will reply, ‘I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.’

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: It helps others.

lender.occupational_info: My agency matches volunteers with an older person who is homebound in order to increase socialization and decrease isolation among the elderlyl

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I want to. I'm from the Philippines originally and have seen first hand how a little bit of money and trust can go a very long way ;)
lender.occupational_info: I'm a school librarian in New York City.

lender.name: Shama
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Schooley
lender.loan_because: I believe that every person should be given an opportunity to better their life, and helping someone through Kiva is a tangible way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student at Seattle Pacific University, I will graduate this spring with a degree in Business Management, after graduation I hope to start a business of my own.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: Now you have touched my life and I have touched yours. Now we are neighbors.
lender.occupational_info: I design and analyze electronic systems.

lender.name: Kaylee
lender.loan_because: I believe people with good ideas who want to work hard and improve their lives and their communities through ingenuity and dedication to their crafts deserve a chance to thrive.
lender.occupational_info: In my work I invite community members to make an investment through my university in solving complex 21st-century problems, creating new knowledge, and improving the lives of students. I raise money for faculty research and teaching, and for scholarships and fellowships for students.

lender.name: Alandis
lender.loan_because: we are all connected as one.
lender.occupational_info: Movement of material from one place to another (Transportation)

lender.name: Randal
lender.loan_because: Having traveled to over 60 countries, I want to make a difference in the lives of others. I have extensive experience working and traveling in developing countries and this is a great way to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I manage a group of USA based small business owners that utilize credit and lending services from the large multinational company I work for. I previously cofounded with my wife a business importing and distributing products from New Zealand.

lender.name: Lamont
lender.loan_because: Every human being has the responsibility to be humane. Kiva offers an opportunity to directly impact the lives of aspiring peoples around the world.
